等压面  空间气压相等的各点组成的面称为等压面（isobaric surface）。因为同一高度上各地的气压是不相等的，所以等压面不是等高面（constant level），也不一定.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Greek isobaros 'of equal weight', from isos 'equal' + baros 'weight'

means.word_mean: 1. an isogram connecting points having equal barometric pressure at a given time
